data.title: L'Atlantide/Lost Atlantis (1921 film by Jacques Feyder)
data.meta_description: First adaptation of Pierre Beno√Æt's eponymous novel entirely shot in Algeria: 1912, a man is found dying of thirst in the middle of French Sahara, he tells how he was held captive by Antinea, the Queen of lost Atlantis. See review, synopsis and link to watch the film at: http://www.
